Package software.leonov.common.base

Class MessageDigests

  • java.lang.Object
    • software.leonov.common.base.MessageDigests
  • public final class MessageDigests
extends Object
    Deprecated.
    Users not working with legacy APIs should prefer Guava's Hashing facility.
    Common MessageDigests which are supported by all Java platform implementations.
    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov

      static MessageDigest md5()
      Deprecated.

      • toString

        public static String toString​(MessageDigest digest)
        Deprecated.
        Returns a lowercase hexadecimal string representation of MessageDigest.digest().

        The MessageDigest is reset after this method returns.

        Parameters:
        digest - the specified MessageDigest
        Returns:
        a lowercase hexadecimal string representation of MessageDigest.digest()
